title: Barrington Levy - In Dub The Lost Mixes

This reissue from the folks at Auralux is a gem of a recording. Both of whom each mixed five tracks on the album. The album is rightly regarded as a classic and is seen by many as one of the last great dub albums.

No one really knows who exactly mixed down these tracks, the album notes say Scientist or Jammy are likely culprits! But whatever the case this is Barrington Levy and The Roots Radics with a new twist of timeless dub!
